weeks.title: Week 1 — The Frostforge: AWS + Terraform Foundations
weeks.goal: Set up AWS safely and provision baseline infra with Terraform.
outcomes: AWS account hygiene: MFA, budgets/alerts, sane IAM setup
Terraform remote state (S3 + DynamoDB lock)
VPC (public/private subnets, routing, NAT — documented tradeoffs)
EKS cluster + managed node group + basic addons
quests: Write docs/architecture.md with an infrastructure diagram
Write a README: how to create/tear down infra

weeks.title: Week 2 — The First Keep: Deploy an App to EKS
weeks.goal: Deploy a boring app the right way (health checks, configs, ingress).
outcomes: Containerized app (Node API + minimal UI)
Helm chart with resources, probes, configmaps/secrets
Ingress via AWS Load Balancer Controller
Optional TLS + DNS (Route53)

weeks.title: Week 3 — The Dragonshout: CI/CD that Looks Like Real Work
weeks.goal: Ship from GitHub to EKS safely, with no long-lived AWS keys.
outcomes: GitHub Actions pipeline (PR checks + main deploy)
OIDC → AWS role assumption
Build + scan + push images to ECR
Deploy via Helm (and optional preview envs per PR)
quests: Write docs/cicd.md explaining permissions and flow

weeks.title: Week 4 — The Eye of Magnus: Observability
weeks.goal: Prove you can operate what you deploy.
outcomes: Metrics (Prometheus) + dashboards (Grafana)
Basic alerts (crashloop, high restarts, node pressure)
Logs (CloudWatch or Loki — pick one and document)
quests: Write runbooks/alerts.md: what alerts exist and what to do

weeks.title: Week 5 — The Ashen Trial: Reliability + Failure Drills
weeks.goal: Show incident handling and reliability improvements.
outcomes: HPA, PDB, safer rollout strategies
Chaos drills (kill pods, bad config, overload)
Postmortem writeup with prevention actions
quests: Add a troubleshooting section to README

weeks.title: Week 6 — The Jarl’s Seal: Package for Hiring
weeks.goal: Turn your work into a narrative recruiters understand in 15 seconds.
outcomes: CV bullets focused on outcomes + systems ownership
LinkedIn headline + featured project links
Interview drills (K8s, AWS, Terraform, CI/CD, debugging)
quests: Record a 2–3 minute demo video walking through deploy + dashboards
Create a 1-page ‘battle card’ cheat sheet for interviews

skillTree.name: Observability
skillTree.why: If you can’t see it, you can’t run it.

Hiring prep: Portfolio README has a one-command setup path
Postmortem exists (even from a simulated incident)
CV bullet points map to evidence
